verses.verse: In the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H4467>reign<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, came this <S%H1697>word<s%> unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> to <S%H6213>me<s%>: Make thee <S%H4147>bonds<s%> and <S%H4133>bars<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> them upon thy <S%H6677>neck<s%>;

and <S%H7971>send<s%> them to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the children of <S%H1121>Ammon<s%>, and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%>, and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon<s%>, by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> that <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> unto <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>;

and give them a <S%H6680>charge<s%> unto their <S%H113>masters<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Thus shall ye <S%H559>say<s%> unto your <S%H113>masters<s%>:

I have <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, the <S%H120>men<s%> and the <S%H929>beasts<s%> that are <S%H6440>upon<s%> the face of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, by my <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and by my <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>; and I <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto whom it <S%H5869>seemeth<s%> right unto <S%H3474>me<s%>.

And now have I <S%H5414>given<s%> all these <S%H776>lands<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, my <S%H5650>servant<s%>; and the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> also have I <S%H5414>given<s%> him to serve <S%H5647>him<s%>.

And all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H1121>him<s%>, and his son, and his <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>, until the <S%H6256>time<s%> of his own <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>: and then <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall make him their <S%H5647>bondman<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H1471>pass<s%>, that the nation and the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> which will not <S%H5647>serve<s%> the same <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and that will not <S%H5414>put<s%> their <S%H6677>neck<s%> under the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, that <S%H1471>nation<s%> will I <S%H6485>punish<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and with the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and with the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, until I have <S%H8552>consumed<s%> them by his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

But as for <S%H8085>you<s%>, hearken ye not to your <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, nor to your <S%H7080>diviners<s%>, nor to your <S%H2472>dreams<s%>, nor to your <S%H6049>soothsayers<s%>, nor to your <S%H3786>sorcerers<s%>, that <S%H559>speak<s%> unto <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, Ye shall not <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>:
for they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> unto <S%H7368>you<s%>, to remove you far from your <S%H127>land<s%>, and that I should drive you <S%H5080>out<s%>, and ye should <S%H6>perish<s%>.

But the <S%H1471>nation<s%> that shall <S%H935>bring<s%> their <S%H6677>neck<s%> under the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3240>him<s%>, that nation will I let remain in their own <S%H127>land<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and they shall <S%H5647>till<s%> <S%H3427>it<s%>, and dwell therein.

And I <S%H1696>spake<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to all these <S%H1697>words<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H935>Bring<s%> your <S%H6677>necks<s%> under the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him and his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H2421>live<s%>.

Why will ye <S%H4191>die<s%>, thou and thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, by the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, and by the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> concerning the <S%H1471>nation<s%> that will not <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>?

And <S%H8085>hearken<s%> not unto the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H559>speak<s%> unto <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, Ye shall not <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>; for they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a lie unto <S%H8267>you<s%>.

For I have not <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5002>them<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, but they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> in my <S%H8034>name<s%>; that I may drive you <S%H5080>out<s%>, and that ye may <S%H6>perish<s%>, <S%H5030>ye<s%>, and the prophets that prophesy unto <S%H5012>you<s%>.

Also I <S%H1696>spake<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and to all this <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H8085>Hearken<s%> not to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> unto <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, <S%H3627>Behold<s%>, the vessels of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> shall now <S%H4120>shortly<s%> be brought <S%H7725>again<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon<s%>; for they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a lie unto <S%H8267>you<s%>.
Hearken <S%H8085><s%> not unto <S%H5647>them<s%>; serve the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and <S%H2421>live<s%>: wherefore should this <S%H5892>city<s%> become a <S%H2723>desolation<s%>?

But if they be <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, and if the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3426>be<s%> with <S%H6293>them<s%>, let them now make intercession to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, that the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> which are <S%H3498>left<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H935>go<s%> not to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> concerning the <S%H5982>pillars<s%>, and concerning the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and concerning the <S%H4350>bases<s%>, and concerning the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that are <S%H3498>left<s%> in this <S%H5892>city<s%>,

which <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1540>not<s%>, when he carried away captive <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and all the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>;

yea <S%H559><s%>, thus saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, concerning the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that are <S%H3498>left<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>:

They shall be <S%H935>carried<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and there shall they <S%H3117>be<s%>, until the day that I <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H5002>them<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; then will I <S%H5927>bring<s%> them <S%H7725>up<s%>, and restore them to this <S%H4725>place<s%>.
